title: Parkour Wearable Tracksuit Reward For My New Parkour Park
body:
> by 0x815bd8454f9fad2415a7903c7de310c130f9b117 (Hustler#b117)

Should the following Tier 2: up to $3,000 USD in MANA, one-time payment grant in the Content Creator category be approved?

## Abstract

I built a very simple and easy-to-use Parkour Park on location 35, -79. Players jump on top of objects to complete the parkour course.

I was very happy this morning seeing a user using my Parkour Park:
https://imgur.com/a/dJu67Hc

I would like to reward players that climb the parkour with a wearable tracksuit so they are incentivized to explore the map.

The wearable Tracksuit will be a 2 Piece Unisex Set of Pant and Jacket of a Color that will be determined in the future.

This grant is only to cover the publication fee for these wearable Tracksuits.

My Goal for this project is to incentivize players to Explore More By Giving them Wearables after Finishing the Parkour Challenge.

I'm a Software Developer, More about me in the description


## Grant size

3,000 USD

## Beneficiary address

0x815Bd8454F9FAD2415A7903C7De310c130f9b117

## Description

Parkour Park:
https://imgur.com/a/bTPZsKg

I built a Parkour Park on land that I'm operating. Someone was kind enough to let me build on his land.

I would like to reward users of my Parkour Park with Wearable tracksuits so everyone goes to the Park to Grab his Tracksuit Set.

Here is a picture of someone using my Parkour Park:
https://imgur.com/a/dJu67Hc

My goal is to incentivize players to explore newly built parcels by rewarding them with wearables.


## Specification

My Parkour Park:
https://imgur.com/a/bTPZsKg

In order to complete my project, I will create a wearable Tracksuit that will be claimable after climbing the parkour.

I'm very confident in my abilities to perform this job because of my preliminary work.

The main obstacle for this project was finding the land to operate because parcels are very costly but right now I'm operating 12 plots which are enough for this job but the parkour is expected to be 1x1 to not take much space.

The tasks left to complete for this project are:

1.  Creating 3D Models of Tracksuits

2.  Submit outfits for review

3.  Integrate Outfit to Parkour Park

I'm very confident that my background as a software developer will help me complete this work. I have experience developing in c# as a full-stack developer. In my free time, I do 3d Modeling and Unity


## Personnel

This is planned to be a solo operation but the Land was provided by the user Gucci.

My portfolio of VR and Desktop Games:
https://javierromancruz1.itch.io/

As you can see in the games I'm used to working with 3D Models and New Technologies.


## Roadmap and milestones

Roadmap

1.  Creating 3D Models of Tracksuits

2.  Submit outfits for review

3.  Integrate Outfit to Parkour Park

**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/proposal/?id=29d776a0-405f-11ec-be0c-afec86cba5e5)**
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
